author: Ian McLaren
description: Tangy apricot with hints of maraschino dried by vermouth and fortified by light rum.
name: Clara Asti√© Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR jam with rum until jam dissolves
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
